name: Large Advanced Aquarium
description: The Large Advanced Aquarium allows Prospectors to store and display their favorite catches. Fish stored in the Large Advanced Aquarium will not spoil so long as it is connected to a power network providing at least 1,000 units ofPowerand a water network providing at least 750 units ofWater. The Large Advanced Aquarium will not function if these requirements are not met. The Large Advanced Aquarium can store 12 fish.
